definitions.definition: A cultivated flowering plant , derived by hybridization within species Viola tricolor .
A deep purple colour, like that of the pansy.
Any of various nymphalid butterflies of the genus Junonia .
A timid , weak man or boy; a wuss .
A male homosexual , especially one who is effeminate .

main_definition: A cultivated flowering plant , derived by hybridization within species Viola tricolor .
secondary_definitions: A deep purple colour, like that of the pansy.
Any of various nymphalid butterflies of the genus Junonia .
( derogatory , colloquial ) A timid , weak man or boy; a wuss .
( derogatory , colloquial , dated ) A male homosexual , especially one who is effeminate .
